title: Forced By The Enforcer
description: He came out of nowhere. A tornado made out of ice and shadows and he swept me in.Men like him aren’t supposed to come up to the surface. They reside in the underworld and keep to themselves but now he is all up in me.In my life what I’ve known is chess. I know strategy but now there is one strategy I don’t know.And it is how to hold on when a brutal mob enforcer wants my all.
author: Ever Lilac
